segments.text: Excuse me . May I ask you some questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me how many credits would be required for a bachelor's degree ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you have to get 166 credits , including required courses and optional courses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . And how long does it take to get a bachelor's degree ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can be completed in four years normally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
